sourcesContent:
<template>
  <input type="text" v-model="text" @input="updateInput(text)">
</template>

<script>
export default {
 name: 'MainInput',

 data:() => ({
  text: ''
 }),

 methods: {
  updateInput() {
   console.log(this.text)
   this.$emit('inputValue', this.text)
  }
 },

}
</script>

<style>

</style>
